'speaker_3': 'Thank you. I want to speak a little bit to this item because I want to make it clear what the intent and purpose behind this item was so that we we can move forward with no miscommunication in an effort to come up with ways to attract new businesses to this city.'

'speaker_3': 'One of the things that I would like to do is to determine what the impact to the city would be, to waive the business license fee that is paid to the city for the first year of a new business.'

'speaker_3': 'And the reason for the request is because over and over again, when you hear from small businesses who want to establish in the city and in other cities, what you routinely hear is that they get hit from every direction and that it's very stressful and difficult for them to get established because they're paying fees to get established'

'speaker_3': 'to all sorts of entities. And so I want to find out what would be involved with our city waiving the fees for a year to allow these businesses to establish and perhaps encourage them to establish here in the city.'

'speaker_3': 'And the costs associated for that business are relatively minor in the grand scheme of things, but can be very impactful to a small business that's trying to establish itself within a city. 'speaker_3': 'Certainly the assessment fees that they collect, this really is purely an analysis of what the fees paid to the city are to get a business license and how much the city would be impacted if those fees were waived for one year based upon the number of businesses that were traditionally used to seeing in the city.'

'speaker_3': 'So establishing kind of a range of businesses, the number of businesses that we expect would develop in the city and figuring out what the fiscal impact would be. 'speaker_3': 'and incentives would be that we could offer to businesses that want to establish here in the city. So with that, I would like staff to take a look at this issue. And I will say that I am mindful that this is not the first time the issue has come before the city council, Long Beach.'

'speaker_3': 'And I understand it's it's a it's an issue that keeps coming up in terms of a possibility that of something that we can do as a city to make ourselves a little bit more attractive to new businesses who want to come in.'

'speaker_3': 'It's an information gathering request really is what this is. And I look forward to staff giving us some information regarding what the impact would be to the city. 'speaker_3': 'the people, the city of Long Beach. So we'll have to balance all of that, but I'd like to balance it all with full information and reporting from staff. So thank you.'
